de.unisiegen.tpml.core.typechecker
Class DefaultTypeCheckerProofContext

java.lang.Object
  de.unisiegen.tpml.core.typechecker.DefaultTypeCheckerProofContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
TypeCheckerProofContext
final class DefaultTypeCheckerProofContext
extends Object
implements TypeCheckerProofContext

Default implementation of the TypeCheckerProofContext interface.

Version:
$Rev: 511 $
Author:
Benedikt Meurer
See Also:
TypeCheckerProofContext

Constructor Detail

DefaultTypeCheckerProofContext

DefaultTypeCheckerProofContext(TypeCheckerProofModel model)
Allocates a new DefaultTypeCheckerProofContext with the specified model. This constructor automatically increments the index of the model using a redo/undo pair, via the TypeCheckerProofModel.setIndex(int) method.

Parameters:
model - the type checker proof model with which the context is associated.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if model is null.
See Also:
TypeCheckerProofModel.setIndex(int)
Method Detail

addEquation

public void addEquation(MonoType left,
                        MonoType right)
Adds a type equation to the list of type equations that serve as input for the unification algorithm.

Specified by:
addEquation in interface TypeCheckerProofContext
Parameters:
left - the monomorphic type on the left side.
right - the monomorphic type on the right side.
See Also:
TypeCheckerProofContext.addEquation(de.unisiegen.tpml.core.types.MonoType, de.unisiegen.tpml.core.types.MonoType)

addProofNode

public void addProofNode(TypeCheckerProofNode node,
                         TypeEnvironment environment,
                         Expression expression,
                         MonoType type)
Adds a new child node below the node, to prove the type safety of the expression in the specified environment. The type is either a type variable or a concrete type, that is the expected type for the expression (used during the unification).

Specified by:
addProofNode in interface TypeCheckerProofContext
Parameters:
node - the parent node.
environment - the new TypeEnvironment for the child node.
expression - the expression for the child node.
type - the expected type for the expression.
See Also:
TypeCheckerProofContext.addProofNode(de.unisiegen.tpml.core.typechecker.TypeCheckerProofNode, de.unisiegen.tpml.core.typechecker.TypeEnvironment, de.unisiegen.tpml.core.expressions.Expression, de.unisiegen.tpml.core.types.MonoType)

getTypeForExpression

public Type getTypeForExpression(Expression expression)
Returns the Type for the given expression if possible, i.e. (BOOL) if expression is an instance of BooleanConstant.

Specified by:
getTypeForExpression in interface TypeCheckerProofContext
Parameters:
expression - an Expression.
Returns:
the Type for the expression.
See Also:
TypeCheckerProofContext.getTypeForExpression(de.unisiegen.tpml.core.expressions.Expression)

instantiate

public MonoType instantiate(Type type)
Instantiates the type using the context information. That said, if type is a PolyType the TypeCheckerProofContext.newTypeVariable() method is used to allocate new type variables for the quantified variables of the polymorphic type, while if type is a MonoType this method simply returns the type.

Specified by:
instantiate in interface TypeCheckerProofContext
Parameters:
type - the Type to instantiate.
Returns:
the instantiated monomorphic type.
See Also:
TypeCheckerProofContext.instantiate(de.unisiegen.tpml.core.types.Type)

newTypeVariable

public TypeVariable newTypeVariable()
Allocates a new TypeVariable that is not already used in the type checker proof model associated with this type checker proof context.

Specified by:
newTypeVariable in interface TypeCheckerProofContext
Returns:
a new, unique TypeVariable.
See Also:
TypeCheckerProofContext.newTypeVariable()

apply

void apply(TypeCheckerProofRule rule,
           TypeCheckerProofNode node,
           MonoType type)
     throws ProofRuleException,
            UnificationException
Applies the specified proof rule to the given node.

Parameters:
rule - the proof rule to apply to the node.
node - the proof node to which to apply the rule.
type - the type the user guessed for the node or null if the user didn't enter a type.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if rule or node is null.
ProofRuleException - if the application of the rule to the node failed for some reason.
UnificationException - if an error occurs while unifying the type equations that resulted from the application of rule to node.

revert

void revert()
Invokes all previously registered undo actions and clears the list of undo actions.

See Also:
addUndoAction(Runnable), getUndoActions()

addRedoAction

void addRedoAction(Runnable redoAction)
Adds the specified redoAction to the internal list of redoable actions, and runs the redoAction. This method should be called before adding the matching undo action via addUndoAction(Runnable).

Parameters:
redoAction - the redoable action.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if redoAction is null.
See Also:
addUndoAction(Runnable), getRedoActions()

addUndoAction

void addUndoAction(Runnable undoAction)
Adds the specified undoAction to the internal list of undoable actions, and runs the undoActions. This method should be called after adding the matching redo action via addRedoAction(Runnable).

Parameters:
undoAction - the undoable action.
Throws:
NullPointerException - if undoAction is null.
See Also:
addRedoAction(Runnable), getUndoActions()

getRedoActions

Runnable getRedoActions()
Returns a Runnable, which performs all the previously recorded redoable actions, added via addRedoAction(Runnable).

Returns:
a Runnable for all recorded redoable actions.
See Also:
addRedoAction(Runnable), getUndoActions()

getUndoActions

Runnable getUndoActions()
Returns a Runnable, which performs all the previously recorded undoable actions, added via addUndoAction(Runnable).

Returns:
a Runnable for all recorded undoable actions.
See Also:
addUndoAction(Runnable), getRedoActions()
